summary: A Hollywood bad boy movie star comes to a town far away. He gets a job in the back of a bakery as he likes the recently dumped owner/baker and her cupcakes. He's in a movie filmed there in December.
cast: Briana Evigan|Corey Sevier|Karissa Vacker|Jeremy Howard|Travis Van Winkle|Brooke Burns|Sean Stone|Denver Dowridge|Coley Feifer|Alexis Lynne Baumert|Shirell Ferguson-Coleman|Shelby Janes|Mike Korich|Keith Dobbins|Fraisia Logan|Paul White|Kelly Herrin|Billy Bolton|Caia Coley|Chewy|Cara-Lynn Branch|Julie Cook|Sean McGee|Tommy Bettis|Nevan Stewart|Laurence Goodhue|Steve Freudenberg|Anny Anny|Xenia Barroso|Christian Tolbert|Lotta Sudminer|Brittanyann Hewitt|Amit Oringer|Ashley Layne|Roziya Damenova|Duncan Dye|Eric Gardner|Debra Dye|Sarah Ghonelm|J. Arthur Coley|Valerie Humbard|Pamela Coley|Maria Kishchenko|Cassie Estelle|Paolo Arriola|Michael Feifer
title: A Star for Christmas
